Title: Fried Calamari
Description: Crispy calamari served with marinara sauce and lemon wedges.

Title: Buffalo Wings
Description: Spicy buffalo wings served with blue cheese dressing and celery sticks.

Title: Grilled Salmon
Description: Grilled salmon filet served with roasted vegetables and mashed potatoes.

Title: Chicken Parmesan
Description: Breaded chicken cutlet topped with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella, served with spaghetti.

Title: Chocolate Cake
Description: Rich chocolate cake served with whipped cream and raspberry sauce.

Title: Cheesecake
Description: Creamy cheesecake served with your choice of toppings.
